results.title: Topical Simvastatin Improves Lesions of Diffuse Normolipemic Plane Xanthoma by Inhibiting Foam Cell Pyroptosis
results.text_hl: Immunofluorescence staining showed that the pyroptotic pathway was significantly attenuated after topical @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ application on the @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin lesions@@@ of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Ethyl-Cellulose Nanosponges for Topical Delivery of Simvastatin with Preferential Skin Retention for Wound Healing in a Full-Thickness Wound Rat Model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ exhibits great potential in treating various @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin diseases@@@ owing to its antibacterial, antioxidant, anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@, and immunomodulatory properties.

results.title: CHILD syndrome mimicking verrucous nevus in a Chinese patient responded well to the topical therapy of compound of simvastatin and cholesterol.
results.text_hl: The excellent therapeutic effect on @DISEASE_Congenital_Hemidysplasia_with_Ichthyosiform_Erythroderma_and_Limb_Defects @DISEASE_MESH:C562515 @@@CHILD syndrome@@@ resulted from the topical treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ provides a proof-of-concept for other topical pathogenesis-based therapies for @<m>DISEASE_Skin_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Yu X, Zhang J, Gu Y, Deng D, Wu Z, Bao L, Li M, Yao Z. CHILD syndrome mimicking verrucous nevus in a Chinese patient responded well to the topical therapy of compound of simvastatin and cholesterol. J Eur Acad Dermatol Venereol. 2018 Jul;32(7):1209-1213. PMID: 29341259
